message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a one-time offer of $1100000 for the product. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice! However, I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950000 for the product. Can you consider this counteroffer?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was really hoping to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll make a new offer of $1050000. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a great deal. What do you think?

I understand your compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your new offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $1025000. Can you consider this compromise?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you halfway from your counteroffer, so I'll make a new offer of $1075000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your new offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $1037500. Can you consider this compromise?
